name: Kill Or Be Killed
description:
Zombies have infested ever last inch of this world! Luke must survive for as long as possible in the hope that someone is still around who can help!

Luke was just an ordinary business man until he worked a late shift one night, when leaving the office he heard a weird grumble and went to investigate, he grabbed his pistol and walked towards the sound. What he found made him feel sick, one of his colleagues had died! Was he murdered? The dead figure lunged at Luke growling one last time as Luke quickly placed a bullet straight in its head! He began walking towards the exit of the office cautiously and as he walked outside, what he found was a living nightmare… The zombie apocalypse has begun…

Follow the games development/myself as a developer:

https://arronburch.wordpress.com/

This is the first game I have made and my first attempt at using unity, any feedback and constructive criticism is appreciated as I am still learning as a Games Development Student. Thanks.

Hope you enjoy!
